name: PHProjectSectionContent
desc: An object containing section elements and layout information for a single level of curation.

items.name: var elements: [PHProjectElement]
items.desc: An array of asset, text, or journal entry elements contained in the content.

items.name: var numberOfColumns: Int
items.desc: The number of columns if section content is displayed in a grid layout.

items.name: var aspectRatio: Double
items.desc: The aspect ratio of the full content layout, defined as width over height.

items.name: var cloudAssetIdentifiers: [PHCloudIdentifier]
items.desc: An array containing all cloud asset identifiers referenced in the content.

items.name: var backgroundColor: NSColor?
items.desc: The background color of the section content when created from an Apple Print Product.
